alert.note: Alert for Livingston Area; Northern Park; Paradise Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 19 at 3:20AM MDT until April 19 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 2 inches. Winds may gust over 40 mph at times near Livingston. * WHERE...Livingston Area, Northern Park, and Paradise Valley. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT early this morning. * IMPACTS...Areas of wet snow and strong winds are expected. This will be hazardous for young livestock and may also create difficult travel conditions. I-90 should stay mostly just wet, but the worst conditions will be over Bozeman Pass which will be slushy or snowpacked this morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for sudden changes in driving conditions as areas of wet snow may be localized.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Livingston Area; Northern Park; Paradise Valley
